name: Medium Bolstering Bubblebalm
description: When this card is drawn: Deals 2 Hydro DMG to the active character on the side of the field this card is on. Create 1 Small Bolstering Bubblebalm and place it at the top of your opponent's deck.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When this card is drawn:</color> Deals 2 $[K102] to the active character on the side of the field this card is on. Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112133]</color> and place it at the top of your opponent's deck.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When this card is drawn:</color> Deals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color> to the active character on the side of the field this card is on. Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Small Bolstering Bubblebalm</color> and place it at the top of your opponent's deck.
